body:
Hi Abraham and Maryam,

To get results in surface level you need to use a different component (readEPSurfaceResults). The file is attached.

The other issue is because of new implementation of natural ventilation. A set of properties should be added to HBZone class and re_Evaluate zone. I will check it in 2015! ;) Thanks for reporting ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/239](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/239)).

Mostapha
